item.title: Need help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @Scott1337 Scott1337
item.description:
@Scott1337 wrote:

client.java:10582: cannot find symbol symbol : method randomlottery() location: class Item2 addItem(Item2.randomlottery(), 1000000000); ^

That’s saying that Item2 it cannot find it’s symbol, so, you need to declare it in your client.java, like I’ve been saying all along.

item.title: Need help pl0x!
item.dc:creator: @master_guard1 master_guard
item.description:
@master_guard1 wrote:

hello i added a lottery command but i got these errors plz can someone help me??

heres command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“lottery”)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 10000000)==true)
{
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10000000);
sendMessage(“You buy a lottery ticket”);
addItem(Item2.randomlottery(), 1000000000);
sendMessage(“Congradulations if you won!”);
sendMessage(“If not oh well you have to wait another 1 minute before you buy another.”);
sendMessage(“Better luck next time.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Do ::lottery for a chance to win the 1 bill !!”;
actionTimer = 60;
}
}

heres erros

client.java:10582: cannot find symbol
symbol : method randomlottery()
location: class Item2
addItem(Item2.randomlottery(), 1000000000);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .
